faqs.question: What curriculum does Wise Oaks follow?
faqs.answer: We follow the Cambridge International Curriculum, complemented by Singapore Maths, strong literacy foundations, and inquiry-based learning across all levels.

faqs.question: What is the student–teacher ratio?
faqs.answer: Wise Oaks maintains a 20:1 student–teacher ratio, ensuring personalised attention while encouraging collaborative learning.

faqs.question: How does the school support new students during transition?
faqs.answer: We provide a structured Bridge Program and personalised academic support to help students smoothly transition into the Cambridge system, regardless of their previous curriculum.

faqs.question: What technology programs are offered at Wise Oaks?
faqs.answer: Through WiseTech CodeSpark, students engage in coding, robotics, app development, digital literacy, AI/ML basics, and hands-on STEM activities from an early age.
